name: Gearlocke
description:
A short Puzzle/Platformer. Beat all 6 levels!

You play as Gearlocke the wrench as he attempts to navigate his way through life. He can use the nearby machinery to his advantage, moving platforms to help him on his way.

Controls are displayed in-game and can be changed at start-up.

Made for the Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2019. 

Made by: Owen S. and Canebo

Theme: Wrenches 101

Achievements: Tango
